channel.title: Meta Coder
channel.description:
{"meta"=>"Reading, Thinking, Coding", "subtitle"=>"Hi, I'm Meta Coder!
Reading, Thinking and Coding is My Life."}

item.title: Awesome 锁屏
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: Awesome装好后用起来得心应手，感觉工作效率明显提高了一个档次。开心。

item.title: awesome 初体验
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: 话说自从转到Xfce4以来，就一直有赶紧换主题的冲动。默认的主题实在有种Win95的感觉。还好感谢@cold的分享，让我体验到awesome + tmux + gnome-do 的强大组合。不仅解决了美观的问题，还大大提升了工作效率，超赞！

item.title: Github多sshkey管理
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: 断断续续的牺牲了一个十一黄金周的时间，终于配置好了这个blog， 虽说还有一些不足之处，留着以后再来逐步的完善就好。可是这个blog被妹子给瞧见了， 非要也给她也搭一个。好吧，还好这个repo已经建好，直接给clone过去就OK了，倒是省了不少事。

item.title: Liquid for Designers
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: 这两天在用jekyll搭博客,一看是liquid语言立刻傻眼了!

item.title: 我的第一篇博客
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: 折腾了整整两天，总算把这个看起来依然“残破不堪”的博客搭建起来，当页面终于不再显示404的时候，我激动的眼泪儿都下来了。

item.title: Theme introduction
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: This post is a showcase of what Holo Alfa looks like, and a reference guide for how you can use it to make your blog shine.

item.title: Guest Posts
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"George Michael", "info"=>"(@GeorgeMichael)"}
item.description: If you want to create a guest post that will appear as if written by another author, simply add an author attribute to the front matter of your blog post. This will be picked up in the template and displayed in the meta-section both on the front page as well as on the individual post pages.

item.title: Code Snippets
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: Whenever you need to post a code snippet, use the liquid tags hilight and endhilight.

item.title: Flat out like a dunny
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"MetaCoder", "email"=>"slow295185031@gmail.com", "info"=>"who is just a Coder Monkey!"}
item.description: She’ll be right bored sh*tless mate he’s got a massive bitzer. Lets throw a trackies where built like a rotten. As stands out like garbo flamin grab us a bogan. We’re going pozzy when she’ll be right cleanskin. Lets throw a chrissie my come a skite. Gutful of middy my gutful of ugg boots. Flat out like a larrikin where grab us a mates. It’ll be apples heaps built like a counter meal. As cross as a booze bus when you little ripper shit house. As cunning as a bush oyster mate as stands out like jumbuck. We’re going whinge mate lets throw a vee dub.
